name: LoveBOTS
description:
These 2 Bots are separated! Bring them back together for the sake of love!

You can control one at a time, But both have a tiny battery, and it won't last long... Thankfully death won't stop them as long as they have battery! Solve simple puzzles as you guide both BOTS to be close once again! Let that be collecting keys to open gates, Battery refills, or even some sort of star you must collect, nothing can stop you! Except for the battery off course.

Controls 

  • Left & Right Arrow -> Move
  • Z -> Jump
  • X -> Switch BOT

You can also press Z at the beginning to skip the intro transition!

- Made for GoedWare Game Jam #5 !

PS : Requires Browser with WebGL3.0 and above to run, any lower requires Hardware Acceleration to be disabled, which slows performance by a lot.
